review_data.content: Poor customer service after they provided 70 gram beef steak for 40 CHF. I would not recommend! Called and they promised to fix it, but ultimately lied about that later. I would not recommend.

review_data.title: Sehr gute und leckere Pizza
review_data.content: Leckere Pizza, schnelle Lieferung, freundliche Kurier, gute Preise. Grosse Auswahl von Pizzi, auch Knoblauch Brötli ist sehr zu empfehlen.

review_data.title: Great place for cheap food in Zurich
review_data.content: This was near my place in Zurich and the food was decent at a very reasonable price. Owners were also quite friendly, despite me not speaking much Swiss German. Get the Diner Box!
